org.ambraproject.wombat.freemarker

Class AssetDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.wombat.freemarker.AssetDirective
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CssLinkDirective, JsDirective

    public abstract class AssetDirective
extends Object
    Base class for Freemarker custom directives used to insert compiled versions of asset files (javascript and CSS).

    • Method Detail

      • addAsset

        protected void addAsset(String assetPath,
            String requestVariableName,
            freemarker.core.Environment environment)
                 throws freemarker.template.TemplateException,
                        IOException
        Called when we are adding a new asset file to the page. If we're in dev mode, this will just render HTML that links to the asset; if not, no HTML will be rendered, and instead the asset file will be queued for compilation.
        Parameters:
        assetPath - path to the asset file being added
        requestVariableName - the name of the request-scoped variable that stores assets awaiting compilation. Typically, there will be one of these per asset type (javascript or CSS).
        environment - freemarker execution environment
        Throws:
        freemarker.template.TemplateException
        IOException

      • getHtml

        protected abstract String getHtml(String assetPath)
        Returns the HTML that renders a link to an asset. This will vary depending on the subclass (and the type of the asset).
        Parameters:
        assetPath - path to the asset file
        Returns:
        HTMl snippet linking to the asset file
